get.summary: Get a Member to the Group with ID
get.description: Get a Member to the Group with ID

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: ID of the group that is fetched

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Id of the member of the group that is fetched

400.description: Invalid ID or member ID supplied

404.description: ID or member ID not found

post.summary: Update a Member to the Group with ID
post.description: Update a Member to the Group with ID

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: ID of the group that is fetched

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Id of the member of the group that is fetched

parameters.name: Member
parameters.description: Member updated of the group that is fetched in JSON

400.description: Invalid ID or member ID supplied

404.description: ID or member ID not found

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: Id of the member of the group that is fetched
